name: item-incineration
title: Item Incineration
author: ForTheOnesThere
description:
Too much stuff? Not enough pollution? Incinerate!

This mod adds a variant of the electric smelter that you can use to burn (almost) anything to ash, which in turn can be compacted to landfill.

Features configurable settings in case you just want to quickly burn things into thin air, as quickly as your inserters will let you.

 But be careful - burning all that stuff emits lots of pollution. There's a reason that 9/10 biters would recommend this mod to a friend.
